tldr: Affected versions of this package may expose authentication tokens and other sensitive headers in trajectory export files. Insufficient secret-detection patterns allow headers such as tokens, cookies, credentials, or passwords to be serialized in plain text, which can lead to information leakage.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `openhands-sdk` library to the patch version.
vulnerable_to: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor
